notes.text: The AI-assisted easy filter now supports filter fields with 1:1 navigation properties
Table export now automatically excludes columns containing 1:N navigation properties to prevent export errors
We've improved the browser tab title format on object pages to be more concise by removing ancestor breadcrumbs
We no longer display the placeholder on the list report page when Apply Automatically is enabled for the variant but the required SmartFilterBar field contains invalid values
We've now resolved an issue where filter changes were not correctly tracked in iAppState on the list report and analytical list page
We've set the ariaLabelledBy property for the RatingIndicator on the object page header so that screen readers correctly read its title
The AI-assisted easy filter now correctly handles semantic date fields when applying and resetting filters
We've resolved an issue where unbound actions were incorrectly displayed in table context menus
We've resolved an issue where the Configuration menu option appeared twice in the UI Adaptation dialog for tables on the list report page and analytical list page
